pullrequest.title: Add schematic view to model editor

content.raw:
Awesome, the schematic view really helps understand how things are connected in the model!

Some usability comments with various degrees of importance:

1. The boxes don't start in the center of the view, and the model seems to be built from the center to the right, leaving the whole left area always empty.

1. The scrollable area is too large for models with few links/joints and too small for complex models. It would be nice to:

    * Remove scroll bars when all items fit the screen
    * Allow scroll bar to go all the way to the right-most box at any zoom level. Right now if you load the PR2 for example, the links on the far right are only visible when zoomed out.

1.  Is there a way to bring up the inspector from the schematic view right now, or is that coming later?

1. Some arrows remain after the joints have been deleted.

1. Long link names don't fit the box

1. When you select a link, the color changes and a bounding box appears, clicking outside changes the color, but the box only disappears when moving the view.
content.html:
Awesome, the schematic view really helps understand how things are connected in the model!

Some usability comments with various degrees of importance:

  1. The boxes don't start in the center of the view, and the model seems to be built from the center to the right, leaving the whole left area always empty.

  2. The scrollable area is too large for models with few links/joints and too small for complex models. It would be nice to:

    • Remove scroll bars when all items fit the screen
    • Allow scroll bar to go all the way to the right-most box at any zoom level. Right now if you load the PR2 for example, the links on the far right are only visible when zoomed out.

  3. Is there a way to bring up the inspector from the schematic view right now, or is that coming later?

  4. Some arrows remain after the joints have been deleted.

  5. Long link names don't fit the box

  6. When you select a link, the color changes and a bounding box appears, clicking outside changes the color, but the box only disappears when moving the view.
